alert.note: Alert for Manua; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 13 at 8:38AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by showers and thunderstorms is possible WHERE...All Islands. WHEN...Through SUNDAY. IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause flooding on roadways and properties and overflowing of streams. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A trough will linger over the territory through the weekend, this will keep the potential for flash flooding for this timeframe. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 837 Taeao Aso Faraile Me 13 2022 ...UA IAI LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE ASO SA... NOFOAGA...Atumotu uma o Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Sa. AAFIAGA...O le tetele o timuga e ono mafua ai lologa ma tafega i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga a`afia gofie, fa`apea auvai pa pa. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O uiga louloua o le tau o lo`o i luga o le atunu`u o le a tumau e oo atu i le faaiuga o le vaiaso. O nei uiga louloua o le a fa`atupula`ia ai le tetele o timuga ma faititili e taape solo e oo i le Aso Gafua. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.
